first I tried extending the existing Store Controller Browse to include "Artist" or "Artists"

Then I tried to apply a genre filter to the store manager version of the syntax

  var albums = db.Albums.Include(a => a.Genre).Include(a => a.Artist).Where(Inhere a miracle happens);
